name: Deeper and Deeper: Funeral Bros.
description:
This game was completed in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48. 

Take on the role of two characters (only controlling one at a time) and fight off the zombie hoard that is attacking your funeral home's graveyard.  As BLUE, you will be able to dig fresh graves and fill in any holes that hold zombie remains. As PINK, you will be able to kill zombies and carry their re-dead corpses to any open open graves. Survive 5 waves and win the game.

WASD to move. RMB to Dig/Shoot. LMB to Fill holes/Carry and drop. Press E to swap characters. Good luck!
